desc: Drip Garden is the most productive compact garden, it's self-watering, self-fertilizing, and modular! It's expandable too, one Drip Garden waters up to 15 plant containers with our expansion pack! See what everyone is talking about and grow full size organic tomatoes, peppers, herbs, and more!

layout.text: Grow up two dozen plants in a 3'x3' area with Drip Garden®
